author: Peter Rudegeair
title: PayPal Takes a Hit, Despite Soaring Profit
text:
PayPal Holdings Inc. is losing a chunk of the business of one of its biggest sources of customers.
eBay Inc., the marketplace website that owned PayPal until it was spun out as a separate company in 2015, said Wednesday that it would start managing the payments flow of buyers and sellers transacting on its website. Adyen BV, a financial-technology startup based in Amsterdam, will take over as eBayâ€™s primary payments processor after its agreement with PayPal ends in mid-2020.
